description: Describes one or more zero-ETL or S3 event integrations with Amazon Redshift.

parameters.name: MaxRecords
parameters.description: The maximum number of response records to return in each call. If the number of remaining response records exceeds the specified MaxRecords value, a value is returned in a marker field of the response. You can retrieve the next set of records by retrying the command with the returned marker value. Default: 100 Constraints: minimum 20, maximum 100.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: A filter that specifies one or more resources to return. (dict) --- A set of elements to filter the returned integrations. Specifies the type of integration filter. Specifies the values to filter on. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: Specifies the type of integration filter.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: Specifies the values to filter on.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: A value that indicates the starting point for the next set of response records in a subsequent request. If a value is returned in a response, you can retrieve the next set of records by providing this returned marker value in the Marker parameter and retrying the command. If the Marker field is empty, all response records have been retrieved for the request.

nested_items.name: Integrations
nested_items.description: List of integrations that are described.

nested_items.name: IntegrationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the integration.

nested_items.name: SourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the database used as the source for replication.

nested_items.name: TargetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Redshift data warehouse to use as the target for replication.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the integration.

nested_items.name: Errors
nested_items.description: Any errors associated with the integration.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The error code of an inbound integration error.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message of an inbound integration error.

nested_items.name: CreateTime
nested_items.description: The time (UTC) when the integration was created.

nested_items.name: KMSKeyId
nested_items.description: The Key Management Service (KMS) key identifier for the key used to encrypt the integration.

nested_items.name: AdditionalEncryptionContext
nested_items.description: The encryption context for the integration. For more information, see Encryption context in the Amazon Web Services Key Management Service Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The list of tags associated with the integration.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key, or name, for the resource tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value for the resource tag.
